definition[0]: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject or situation
example[0]: Health officials have tried to raise awareness (=improve people’s knowledge) about AIDS.
definition[1]: the ability to notice something using your senses
example[1]: an artist’s awareness of light and color
definition[2]: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject, situation, or thing
example[2]: US investors’ awareness of international bond markets
example[3]: They need to raise awareness of the product in markets such as France and the US, where it is less well known.
